requirements.description: No sensitive personal information should be used with the service, except as permitted under section 4.5 (Protected Health Information).
The service is not intended to meet legal obligations, including HIPAA requirements, and Sentry is not a business associate under HIPAA, unless specified in a BAA.

type.summary: Service Not Intended for HIPAA Compliance

requirements.description: Sentry has no liability for sensitive personal information, except for PHI submitted in accordance with section 4.5 (Protected Health Information).

type.summary: No Liability for Sensitive Personal Information
